        }

        body {
            background-color: var(--bg-color);
            color: var(--text-color);
            height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
            font-family: "JetBrains Mono", "Share Tech Mono", "Consolas", "Monaco", "Courier New", monospace;
            font-feature-settings: "liga"1, "calt"1, "kern"1;
            -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
            -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
            text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;
            font-variant-ligatures: common-ligatures;
            font-kerning: normal;
        }

        input,
        textarea,
        pre,
        code {
            font-family: "JetBrains Mono", "Share Tech Mono", "Consolas", "Monaco", "Courier New", monospace;
            font-feature-settings: "liga"1, "calt"1;
            -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
            -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
        }

        /* --- HEADER HUD --- */
        header {
            background: var(--panel-bg);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-drop);
            padding: 0 1.5rem;
            z-index: 100;
            flex-shrink: 0;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            height: 50px;
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            justify-content: space-between;
            position: relative;
            margin-bottom: 10px;
        }

        /* Decorative Screws */
        header::after,
        header::before,
        .panel::after,
        .panel::before {
            content: '';
            width: 8px;
            height: 8px;
            background: var(--metal-gradient);
            position: absolute;
            border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
            box-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            z-index: 101;
        }

        header::before {
            top: 8px;
            left: 8px;
        }

        header::after {
            top: 8px;
            right: 8px;
        }

        .logo {
            font-family: "Orbitron", "JetBrains Mono", "Share Tech Mono", sans-serif;
            font-weight: 700;
            color: var(--highlight);
            letter-spacing: 2px;
            font-size: 1.1rem;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 12px;
        }

        .nav-tabs {
            display: flex;
            gap: 8px;
            height: 100%;
            align-items: center;
            position: relative;
        }

        .nav-tabs::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            bottom: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            height: 2px;
            background: var(--border-color);
            z-index: 0;
        }

        /* --- BUTTONS (PHYS-BTN) --- */
        .btn-base {
            height: 36px;
            min-width: 36px;
            background: var(--panel-bg);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-drop);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            cursor: pointer;
            color: var(--text-muted);
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            font-family: "Share Tech Mono", "JetBrains Mono", "Consolas", "Monaco", "Courier New", monospace;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            font-weight: bold;
            transition: all 0.15s;
            padding: 0 16px;
            gap: 8px;
            position: relative;
        }

        .btn-base:hover {
            color: var(--text-color);
            background: var(--bg-color);
        }

        .btn-base:active,
        .btn-base.active {
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-inset);
            color: var(--highlight);

        }

        .btn-base.active::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            bottom: -1px;
            left: 50%;
            transform: translateX(-50%);
            width: 60%;
            height: 3px;
            background: var(--highlight);
            box-shadow: 0 0 8px var(--highlight);
            z-index: 1;
        }

        .nav-tabs .btn-base {
            background: transparent;
            border: none;
            box-shadow: none;
            border-bottom: 2px solid transparent;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-drop);
        }

        .nav-tabs .btn-base:hover {
            background: var(--bg-color);
            border-bottom-color: var(--border-color);
        }

        .nav-tabs .btn-base.active {
            background: transparent;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-drop);
            border-bottom-color: var(--highlight);
        }

        .nav-tabs .btn-base.active::after {
            width: 100%;
            height: 2px;
            bottom: -2px;
        }

        .btn-primary {
            color: var(--highlight);
            border-color: var(--border-color);
            opacity: 0.9;
            font-family: "JetBrains Mono", "Share Tech Mono", "Consolas", "Monaco", "Courier New", monospace;
        }

        .btn-danger {
            color: var(--led-red);
        }

        .btn-icon {
            padding: 0;
            font-size: 1rem;
            width: 36px;
        }

        /* --- LAYOUT --- */
        .app-container {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            flex: 1;
            overflow: hidden;
            padding: 0 10px 10px 10px;
        }

        .view-section {
            display: none;
            height: 100%;
            width: 100%;
        }

        .view-section.active {
            display: flex;
            gap: 10px;
        }

        /* --- PANELS --- */
        .panel {
            background: var(--panel-bg);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-drop);
            padding: 1rem;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .panel::before {
            top: 6px;
            left: 6px;
            width: 6px;
            height: 6px;
        }

        .panel::after {
            bottom: 6px;
            right: 6px;
            width: 6px;
            height: 6px;
        }

        .panel-flex-1 {
            flex: 1;
        }

        .panel-w-50 {
            width: 50%;
        }

        .panel-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            font-family: "Orbitron", "JetBrains Mono", "Share Tech Mono", sans-serif;
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            color: var(--text-muted);
            letter-spacing: 1px;
        }

        .panel-header-title::before {
            content: "■ ";
            color: var(--highlight);
            margin-right: 5px;
        }

        /* --- INPUTS --- */
        .form-group {
            margin-bottom: 12px;
        }

        .form-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
            gap: 10px;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
        }

        label {
            display: block;
            font-size: 0.7rem;
            color: var(--text-muted);
            margin-bottom: 5px;
            text-transform: uppercase;
        }

        input[type="text"],
        textarea {
            width: 100%;
            background: var(--bg-color);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            color: var(--text-color);
            font-family: "Share Tech Mono", "JetBrains Mono", "Consolas", "Monaco", "Courier New", monospace;
            padding: 8px 12px;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-inset);
            transition: all 0.2s;
        }

        input[type="text"]:focus,
        textarea:focus {
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--highlight);
            color: var(--highlight);
        }

        /* --- LIST SYSTEM --- */
        .list-container {
            flex: 1;
            overflow-y: auto;
            background: var(--bg-color);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-inset);
            padding: 10px;
            border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            margin-top: 10px;
        }

        .list-item {
            background: var(--panel-bg);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            padding: 10px;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            transition: all 0.2s;
            position: relative;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-drop);
        }

        .list-item:hover {
            border-left-color: var(--highlight);
            background: var(--bg-color);
        }

        .list-item.editing {
            border-color: var(--highlight);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-drop);
        }

        .list-item::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            top: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            width: 3px;
            background: transparent;
            transition: background 0.2s;
        }

        .list-item:hover::before {
            background: var(--highlight);
        }

        .item-meta {
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 2px;
        }

        .item-title {
            font-weight: bold;
            font-size: 0.85rem;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: flex-start;
        }

        .item-file {
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--text-muted);
        }

        .item-id {
            font-size: 0.65rem;
            color: var(--highlight);
            margin-right: 5px;
            font-family: var(--font-stack);
        }

        .item-actions {
            display: flex;
            gap: 5px;
        }

        /* Grid View */
        .list-wrapper.grid-view {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(200px, 1fr));
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .grid-view .list-item {
            flex-direction: column;
            align-items: flex-start;
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .grid-view .item-actions {
            width: 100%;
            justify-content: flex-end;
            border-top: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            padding-top: 5px;
            margin-top: 5px;
        }

        /* --- OUTPUT AREA --- */
        .output-screen {
            flex: 1;
            background: var(--screen-bg);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-inset);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            padding: 15px;
            overflow: auto;
            color: var(--text-color);
            font-size: 0.8rem;
            line-height: 1.5;
        }

        /* --- TOOLS & RESIZER --- */
        .tools-split {
            display: flex;
            height: 100%;
            gap: 0;
        }

        .resizer {
            width: 12px;
            background: var(--bg-color);
            border-left: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            border-right: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            cursor: col-resize;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            z-index: 10;
        }

        .resizer::after {
            content: '|||';
            color: var(--text-muted);
            font-size: 8px;
            transform: rotate(90deg);
        }

        .monaco-wrapper {
            flex: 1;
            position: relative;
            background: var(--screen-bg);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-inset);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            overflow: hidden;
        }

        .tools-textarea {
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: transparent;
            border: none;
            color: var(--text-color);
            padding: 10px;
            resize: none;
        }

        /* --- JSON SYNTAX --- */
        .json-key {
            color: var(--json-key);
        }

        .json-string {
            color: var(--json-string);
        }

        .json-number {
            color: var(--json-number);
        }

        .json-boolean {
            color: var(--json-boolean);
        }

        .json-null {
            color: var(--json-null);
            font-style: italic;
        }

        /* --- MODAL --- */
        .modal-overlay {
            position: fixed;
            inset: 0;
            display: none;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            z-index: 2000;
        }

        .modal-overlay.active {
            display: flex;
        }

        .modal-box {
            background: var(--panel-bg);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-drop);
            border: 1px solid var(--highlight);
            width: 400px;
            padding: 2px;
        }

        .modal-header {
            background: rgba(255, 115, 0, 0.1);
            padding: 10px 15px;
            color: var(--highlight);
            font-family: "Orbitron", "JetBrains Mono", "Share Tech Mono", sans-serif;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .modal-content {
            padding: 20px;
            color: var(--text-color);
        }

        .modal-footer {
            padding: 10px 15px;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: flex-end;
            gap: 10px;
            background: var(--bg-color);
            border-top: 1px solid var(--border-color);
        }

        /* --- TOAST --- */
        .toast {
            position: fixed;
            bottom: 20px;
            right: 20px;
            background: var(--panel-bg);
            border: 1px solid var(--highlight);
            color: var(--text-color);
            padding: 10px 20px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 10px;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-drop);
            transform: translateX(150%);
            transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.18, 0.89, 0.32, 1.28);
            z-index: 3000;
        }

        .toast.show {
            transform: translateX(0);
        }

        .toast i {
            color: var(--highlight);
        }

        /* --- HELP --- */
        .help-list {
            list-style: none;
            padding-left: 10px;
        }

        .help-list li {
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            position: relative;
            padding-left: 15px;
            font-size: 0.9rem;
            color: var(--text-muted);
        }

        .help-list li::before {
            content: '>';
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            color: var(--highlight);
        }

        .import-area {
            background: var(--bg-color);
            padding: 10px;
            border: 1px dashed var(--border-color);
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }

        /* --- RESPONSIVE --- */
        @media (max-width: 900px) {
            .view-section.active {
                flex-direction: column;
            }

            .panel-w-50 {
                width: 100%;
            }

            .tools-split {
                flex-direction: column;
            }

            .resizer {
                height: 12px;
                width: 100%;
                cursor: row-resize;
                border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
                border-width: 1px 0;
            }

            .resizer::after {
                transform: rotate(0);
            }

            header {
                padding: 0 10px;
                flex-wrap: wrap;
                height: auto;
                padding-bottom: 10px;
            }

            .nav-tabs {
                width: 100%;
                justify-content: center;
                margin-top: 10px;
                gap: 4px;
            }

            .nav-tabs .btn-base {
                flex: 1;
                font-size: 0.7rem;
                padding: 0 8px;
            }
        }

        .tech-id {
            position: absolute;
            bottom: 3px;
            right: 20px;
            font-size: 0.55rem;
            color: var(--text-muted);
            opacity: 0.5;
            font-family: "Share Tech Mono", "JetBrains Mono", "Consolas", "Monaco", "Courier New", monospace;
            pointer-events: none;
        }

        .hidden {
            display: none !important;
        }

        .panel-footer {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: flex-start;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 10px;
            border-top: 1px solid var(--border-color);
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .icon {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }

        .icon i {
            font-size: 1rem;
            color: var(--text-muted);
            transition: color 0.2s;
        }

        .icon:hover i {
            color: var(--text-color);
        }
    </style>
</head>

<body>
    <!-- HEADER -->
    <header>
        <div class="logo">
            <i class="fas fa-microchip"></i>
            <span>GIST.SYS - V3.1</span>
        </div>

        <nav class="nav-tabs" role="tablist" aria-label="Main Navigation">
            <button class="btn-base active" data-target="generator" role="tab" aria-selected="true"
                aria-controls="generator">GENERATOR</button>
            <button class="btn-base" data-target="tools" role="tab" aria-selected="false"
                aria-controls="tools">NARZĘDZIA</button>
            <button class="btn-base" data-target="help" role="tab" aria-selected="false"
                aria-controls="help">INFO</button>
        </nav>

        <div style="display: flex; gap: 10px;">
            <button id="themeToggle" class="btn-base btn-icon" title="Przełącz Motyw">
                <i class="fas fa-adjust"></i>
            </button>
        </div>
    </header>

    <main class="app-container">

        <!-- VIEW: GENERATOR -->
        <section id="generator" class="view-section active" role="tabpanel" aria-hidden="false">
            <!-- INPUT PANEL -->
            <div class="panel panel-w-50">
                <div class="panel-header">
                    <span class="panel-header-title">STRUMIEŃ WEJŚCIOWY</span>
                    <button id="importBtn" class="btn-base" style="height: 24px; font-size: 0.7rem;">IMPORT</button>
                </div>

                <!-- IMPORT BOX -->
                <div id="importArea" class="import-area hidden">
                    <label>JSON SOURCE URL</label>
                    <div style="display: flex; gap: 5px;">
                        <input type="text" id="importUrlInput"
                            value="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/skokivPr/json-lista/refs/heads/main/html.json">
                        <button id="confirmImportBtn" class="btn-base btn-primary">LOAD</button>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- FORM -->
                <div style="flex-shrink: 0;">
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label>RAW GIST URL</label>
                        <input type="text" id="urlInput"
                            placeholder="https://gist.githubusercontent.com/.../raw/file.html">
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-grid">
                        <div>
                            <label>ENTITY TITLE</label>
                            <input type="text" id="titleInput" placeholder="Project Name">
                        </div>
                        <div>
                            <label>FILENAME</label>
                            <input type="text" id="filenameInput" placeholder="index.html">
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div style="display: flex; gap: 10px;">
                        <button id="addBtn" class="btn-base btn-primary" style="flex: 1;" disabled>DODAJ DO
                            BUFORA</button>
                        <button id="cancelBtn" class="btn-base btn-danger hidden">ANULUJ</button>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- LIST HEADER -->
                <div
                    style="margin-top: 20px; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color); padding-bottom: 5px;">
                    <span style="font-size: 0.7rem; color: var(--text-muted);">BUFOR DANYCH [<span id="count"
                            style="color: var(--highlight);">0</span>]</span>
                    <div style="display: flex; gap: 5px;">
                        <button id="viewToggleBtn" class="btn-base btn-icon"
                            style="width: 28px; height: 28px; font-size: 1rem;"><i class="fas fa-th-large"></i></button>
                        <button id="clearBtn" class="btn-base btn-icon btn-danger hidden"
                            style="width: 28px; height: 28px; font-size: 1rem;"><i class="fas fa-trash"></i></button>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- LIST -->
                <div class="list-container">
                    <div id="list" class="list-wrapper">
                        <div style="text-align: center; padding: 40px; color: var(--text-muted); font-size: 0.75rem;">
                            OCZEKIWANIE NA DANE...
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="tech-id">PNL-IN-01</div>
            </div>

            <!-- OUTPUT PANEL -->
            <div class="panel panel-flex-1">
                <div class="panel-header">
                    <span class="panel-header-title"> WYJŚCIOWA (JSON)</span>
                    <button id="copyBtn" class="btn-base">KOPIUJ</button>
                </div>
                <div class="output-screen">
                    <pre id="jsonOutput" style="margin: 0;"></pre>
                </div>
                <div class="tech-id">PNL-OUT-02</div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- VIEW: TOOLS -->
        <section id="tools" class="view-section" role="tabpanel" aria-hidden="true">
            <div class="panel" style="width: 100%; padding: 0; gap: 0; flex-direction: row;">

                <!-- LEFT TOOL -->
                <div id="toolsLeftPanel" style="flex: 1; display: flex; flex-direction: column; padding: 1rem;">
                    <div class="panel-header">
                        <span class="panel-header-title">DANE ŹRÓDŁOWE</span>
                        <div style="display: flex; gap: 5px;">
                            <button onclick="clearField('toolsInput')" class="btn-base btn-icon"
                                style="width: 28px; height: 28px; font-size: 1rem;"><i
                                    class="fas fa-eraser"></i></button>
                            <button onclick="pasteTo('toolsInput')" class="btn-base btn-icon"
                                style="width: 28px; height: 28px; font-size: 1rem;"><i
                                    class="fas fa-paste"></i></button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div style="display: flex; gap: 5px; margin-bottom: 10px;">
                        <button onclick="toolsEncode()" class="btn-base btn-primary" style="flex: 1;">B64 ENC</button>
                        <button onclick="toolsPrettify()" class="btn-base" style="flex: 1;">FORMAT</button>
                        <button onclick="toolsMinify()" class="btn-base" style="flex: 1;">MINIFY</button>
                    </div>
                    <div class="monaco-wrapper">
                        <div id="toolsInput" style="width: 100%; height: 100%;"></div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- RESIZER -->
                <div id="toolsResizer" class="resizer"></div>

                <!-- RIGHT TOOL -->
                <div id="toolsRightPanel" style="flex: 1; display: flex; flex-direction: column; padding: 1rem;">
                    <div class="panel-header">
                        <span class="panel-header-title">WYNIK</span>
                        <div style="display: flex; gap: 5px;">
                            <button onclick="clearField('toolsOutput')" class="btn-base btn-icon"
                                style="width: 28px; height: 28px; font-size: 1rem;"><i
                                    class="fas fa-eraser"></i></button>
                            <button onclick="copyToClipboard('toolsOutput')" class="btn-base btn-icon"
                                style="width: 28px; height: 28px; font-size: 1rem;"><i class="fas fa-copy"></i></button>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div style="display: flex; gap: 5px; margin-bottom: 10px;">
                        <button onclick="toolsDecode()" class="btn-base btn-primary" style="flex: 1;">B64 DEC</button>
                    </div>
                    <div class="monaco-wrapper">
                        <textarea id="toolsOutput" class="tools-textarea" placeholder="Output stream..."></textarea>
                    </div>
                </div>

            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- VIEW: HELP -->
        <section id="help" class="view-section" role="tabpanel" aria-hidden="true" style="justify-content: center;">
            <div class="panel" style="max-width: 800px; height: fit-content;">
                <div class="panel-header">
                    <span class="panel-header-title">INFO</span>
                </div>
                <div style="padding: 10px;">
                    <h4
                        style="color: var(--highlight); margin-bottom: 10px; border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color); padding-bottom: 5px;">
                        :: SEKCJA 1 - GENERATOR LISTY</h4>
                    <ul class="help-list">
                        <li>Wprowadź link <strong>RAW GIST</strong> w odpowiednie pole. System automatycznie parsuje
                            metadane.</li>
                        <li>Zweryfikuj <strong>Tytuł</strong> oraz <strong>Nazwę pliku</strong>.</li>
                        <li>Zatwierdź przyciskiem <strong>DODAJ DO BUFORA</strong>.</li>
                        <li>Skopiuj wynikowy JSON z panelu wyjściowego.</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h4
                        style="color: var(--highlight); margin-bottom: 10px; margin-top: 20px; border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color); padding-bottom: 5px;">
                        :: SEKCJA 2 - NARZĘDZIA</h4>
                    <ul class="help-list">
                        <li><strong>FORMAT</strong>: Poprawia wcięcia JSON dla czytelności.</li>
                        <li><strong>MINIFY</strong>: Usuwa zbędne białe znaki (kompresja).</li>
                        <li><strong>B64 ENC/DEC</strong>: Kodowanie i dekodowanie Base64 (UTF-8).</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                <div class="panel-footer">
                    <button onclick="window.open('https://github.com/skokivPr/json-lista', '_blank')"
                        class="btn-base btn-primary icon">
                        <i class="fab fa-github"></i> GITHUB
                    </button>
                    <button onclick="window.open('https://gist.github.com/', '_blank')"
                        class="btn-base btn-primary icon">
                        <i class="fas fa-code"></i> GIST
                    </button>
                </div>
                <div class="tech-id">MAN-01</div>
            </div>
        </section>

    </main>

    <!-- TOAST & MODAL -->
    <div id="toast" class="toast">
        <i id="toastIcon" class="fas"></i>
        <span id="toastMessage"></span>
    </div>

    <div id="confirmModal" class="modal-overlay">
        <div class="modal-box">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <i class="fas fa-exclamation-triangle"></i> OSTRZEŻENIE SYSTEMOWE
            </div>
            <div class="modal-content">
                <p id="confirmMessage">Potwierdź wykonanie operacji?</p>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer">
                <button id="confirmCancelBtn" class="btn-base">ANULUJ</button>
                <button id="confirmOkBtn" class="btn-base btn-primary">POTWIERDŹ</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <script src="monaco-styles.js"></script>
    <script>
        /* --- CORE LOGIC --- */
        const state = { items: [], nextId: 1, editingId: null };
        let toolsEditor = null;
        let isGridView = localStorage.getItem("viewMode") === "grid";

        // DOM Cache
        const els = {
            tabs: document.querySelectorAll(".btn-base[data-target]"),
            sections: document.querySelectorAll(".view-section"),
            themeToggle: document.getElementById("themeToggle"),
            url: document.getElementById("urlInput"),
            title: document.getElementById("titleInput"),
            filename: document.getElementById("filenameInput"),
            addBtn: document.getElementById("addBtn"),
            cancelBtn: document.getElementById("cancelBtn"),
            list: document.getElementById("list"),
            count: document.getElementById("count"),
            jsonOutput: document.getElementById("jsonOutput"),
            copyBtn: document.getElementById("copyBtn"),
            clearBtn: document.getElementById("clearBtn"),
            importBtn: document.getElementById("importBtn"),
            importArea: document.getElementById("importArea"),
            importUrl: document.getElementById("importUrlInput"),
            confirmImport: document.getElementById("confirmImportBtn"),
            tInput: document.getElementById("toolsInput"),
            tOutput: document.getElementById("toolsOutput"),
            resizer: document.getElementById("toolsResizer"),
            leftPanel: document.getElementById("toolsLeftPanel"),
            viewToggleBtn: document.getElementById("viewToggleBtn"),
            confirmModal: document.getElementById("confirmModal"),
            confirmOkBtn: document.getElementById("confirmOkBtn"),
            confirmCancelBtn: document.getElementById("confirmCancelBtn"),
        };

        // --- THEME ---
        let isDark = localStorage.getItem("theme") !== "light";
        function updateTheme() {
            document.documentElement.setAttribute("theme", isDark ? "dark" : "light");
            if (toolsEditor && window.monaco) {
                // Użyj motywów z monaco-styles.js jeśli są dostępne, w przeciwnym razie fallback do standardowych
                const theme = isDark ? 'terminal-dark' : 'terminal-light';
                try {
                    monaco.editor.setTheme(theme);
                } catch (e) {
                    // Fallback do standardowych motywów jeśli niestandardowe nie są dostępne
                    monaco.editor.setTheme(isDark ? "vs-dark" : "vs");
                }
            }
        }
        updateTheme();
        els.themeToggle.addEventListener("click", () => {
            isDark = !isDark;
            localStorage.setItem("theme", isDark ? "dark" : "light");
            updateTheme();
        });

        // --- MONACO ---
        function initMonaco() {
            if (toolsEditor) return;
            els.tInput.innerHTML = "";

            // Użyj motywów z monaco-styles.js jeśli są dostępne
            let theme = isDark ? 'terminal-dark' : 'terminal-light';
            try {
                // Sprawdź czy motyw jest zdefiniowany
                if (typeof monaco !== 'undefined' && monaco.editor) {
                    // Spróbuj ustawić motyw - jeśli nie istnieje, zostanie rzucony błąd
                    monaco.editor.setTheme(theme);
                }
            } catch (e) {
                // Fallback do standardowych motywów
                theme = isDark ? "vs-dark" : "vs";
            }

            toolsEditor = monaco.editor.create(els.tInput, {
                value: localStorage.getItem("toolsEditor_content") || "",
                language: "json",
                theme: theme,
                automaticLayout: true,
                minimap: { enabled: false },
                fontFamily: "'JetBrains Mono', 'Share Tech Mono', 'Consolas', 'Monaco', 'Courier New', monospace",
                fontSize: 12,
                scrollBeyondLastLine: false,
                padding: { top: 10, bottom: 10 },
                minimap: { enabled: true },
                fontLigatures: true,
                bracketPairColorization: { enabled: true },
                guides: { bracketPairs: true, indent: true },
                renderLineHighlight: 'line',
                smoothScrolling: true,
                mouseWheelZoom: true,
                wordWrap: 'on'
            });
            toolsEditor.onDidChangeModelContent(() => localStorage.setItem("toolsEditor_content", toolsEditor.getValue()));
        }

        if (window.monaco) {
            // Monaco już załadowany, poczekaj na załadowanie motywów
            setTimeout(() => initMonaco(), 100);
        } else {
            require.config({ paths: { vs: "https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/monaco-editor/0.36.1/min/vs" } });
            require(["vs/editor/editor.main"], () => {
                // Poczekaj na załadowanie motywów z monaco-styles.js
                setTimeout(() => initMonaco(), 100);
            });
        }

        function getToolsVal() { return toolsEditor ? toolsEditor.getValue() : ""; }
        function setToolsVal(v) { if (toolsEditor) toolsEditor.setValue(v); }

        // --- NAVIGATION ---
        els.tabs.forEach(tab => {
            tab.addEventListener("click", () => {
                els.tabs.forEach(t => {
                    t.classList.remove("active");
                    t.setAttribute("aria-selected", "false");
                });
                els.sections.forEach(s => s.classList.remove("active"));
                tab.classList.add("active");
                tab.setAttribute("aria-selected", "true");
                const target = document.getElementById(tab.dataset.target);
                if (target) {
                    target.classList.add("active");
                    target.setAttribute("aria-hidden", "false");
                }
                els.sections.forEach(s => {
                    if (s !== target) s.setAttribute("aria-hidden", "true");
                });
                if (tab.dataset.target === "tools" && toolsEditor) setTimeout(() => toolsEditor.layout(), 50);
            });
        });

        // --- GENERATOR LOGIC ---
        els.url.addEventListener("input", (e) => {
            validate();
            if (e.target.value.includes("/raw/") && !state.editingId) {
                try {
                    const parts = e.target.value.split("/");
                    const fname = parts[parts.length - 1];
                    if (!els.filename.value) els.filename.value = decodeURIComponent(fname);
                    if (!els.title.value) els.title.value = decodeURIComponent(fname.split(".")[0]).replace(/[-_]/g, " ").replace(/\b\w/g, c => c.toUpperCase());
                    validate();
                } catch (err) { }
            }
        });
        els.title.addEventListener("input", validate);
        els.filename.addEventListener("input", validate);

        function validate() {
            els.addBtn.disabled = !(els.url.value.trim() && els.title.value.trim());
        }

        els.addBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
            const newItem = {
                title: els.title.value,
                filename: els.filename.value || "unknown",
                url: els.url.value
            };

            if (state.editingId) {
                const idx = state.items.findIndex(i => i.id === state.editingId);
                if (idx !== -1) state.items[idx] = { ...state.items[idx], ...newItem };
                resetEdit();
            } else {
                state.items.push({ id: state.nextId++, ...newItem });
                resetForm();
            }
            render();
        });

        function resetForm() {
            els.url.value = ""; els.title.value = ""; els.filename.value = "";
            validate();
        }

        function resetEdit() {
            state.editingId = null;
            resetForm();
            els.addBtn.textContent = "DODAJ DO BUFORA";
            els.cancelBtn.classList.add("hidden");
            render();
        }
        els.cancelBtn.addEventListener("click", resetEdit);

        window.editItem = function (id) {
            const item = state.items.find(i => i.id === id);
            if (!item) return;
            state.editingId = id;
            els.url.value = item.url;
            els.title.value = item.title;
            els.filename.value = item.filename;
            els.addBtn.textContent = "AKTUALIZUJ REKORD";
            els.cancelBtn.classList.remove("hidden");
            validate();
            render();
        };

        window.removeItem = function (id) {
            if (state.editingId === id) resetEdit();
            state.items = state.items.filter(i => i.id !== id);
            render();
        };

        els.clearBtn.addEventListener("click", async () => {
            if (await confirmAction("Czy wyczyścić bufor danych?")) {
                resetEdit();
                state.items = [];
                state.nextId = 1;
                render();
                toast("Bufor wyczyszczony.");
            }
        });

        // Import
        els.importBtn.addEventListener("click", () => els.importArea.classList.toggle("hidden"));
        els.confirmImport.addEventListener("click", async () => {
            if (!els.importUrl.value) return;
            els.confirmImport.textContent = "LOADING...";
            try {
                const res = await fetch(els.importUrl.value);
                const data = await res.json();
                if (!Array.isArray(data)) throw new Error("Bad Format");
                state.items = data.map((i, idx) => ({
                    id: idx + 1,
                    title: i.title || "Bez tytułu",
                    filename: i.filename || "file",
                    url: i.url || "#"
                }));
                state.nextId = state.items.length + 1;
                render();
                toast("Import zakończony.");
                els.importArea.classList.add("hidden");
            } catch (e) { toast("Błąd importu.", "err"); }
            els.confirmImport.textContent = "LOAD";
        });

        // --- RENDER ---
        function render() {
            const jsonStr = state.items.length ? JSON.stringify(state.items, null, 2) : "// Oczekiwanie na dane...";
            els.jsonOutput.innerHTML = highlight(jsonStr);
            els.count.textContent = state.items.length;
            if (state.items.length) els.clearBtn.classList.remove("hidden");
            else els.clearBtn.classList.add("hidden");

            const listHtml = state.items.map(i => `
                <div class="list-item ${state.editingId === i.id ? 'editing' : ''}">
                    <div class="item-meta">
                        <div class="item-title"><span class="item-id">[ID:${String(i.id).padStart(2, '0')}]</span>${escape(i.title)}</div>
                        <div class="item-file">${escape(i.filename)}</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="item-actions">
                        <button onclick="editItem(${i.id})" class="btn-base btn-icon" style="width:28px;height:28px;font-size:1rem;"><i class="fas fa-edit"></i></button>
                        <button onclick="removeItem(${i.id})" class="btn-base btn-icon btn-danger" style="width:28px;height:28px;font-size:1rem;"><i class="fas fa-times"></i></button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            `).join("");

            els.list.innerHTML = listHtml || `<div style="text-align: center; padding: 40px; color: var(--text-muted); font-size: 0.75rem;">OCZEKIWANIE NA DANE...</div>`;

            if (isGridView) {
                els.list.classList.remove('list-view');
                els.list.classList.add('grid-view');
                els.viewToggleBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-list"></i>';
            } else {
                els.list.classList.remove('grid-view');
                els.list.classList.add('list-view');
                els.viewToggleBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-th-large"></i>';
            }
        }

        els.viewToggleBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
            isGridView = !isGridView;
            localStorage.setItem("viewMode", isGridView ? "grid" : "list");
            render();
        });

        els.copyBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
            if (!state.items.length) return;
            navigator.clipboard.writeText(JSON.stringify(state.items, null, 2));
            toast("JSON w schowku.");
        });

        // --- TOOLS ---
        window.toolsEncode = () => { try { els.tOutput.value = btoa(unescape(encodeURIComponent(getToolsVal()))); toast("Base64 Encoded."); } catch (e) { toast("Error.", "err"); } };
        window.toolsDecode = () => { try { const dec = decodeURIComponent(escape(atob(els.tOutput.value.trim()))); setToolsVal(dec); try { setToolsVal(JSON.stringify(JSON.parse(dec), null, 2)); } catch (e) { } toast("Decoded."); } catch (e) { toast("Base64 Error.", "err"); } };
        window.toolsPrettify = () => { try { setToolsVal(JSON.stringify(JSON.parse(getToolsVal()), null, 2)); toast("Formatted."); } catch (e) { toast("JSON Error.", "err"); } };
        window.toolsMinify = () => { try { setToolsVal(JSON.stringify(JSON.parse(getToolsVal()))); toast("Minified."); } catch (e) { toast("JSON Error.", "err"); } };

        window.clearField = (id) => { if (id === 'toolsInput') setToolsVal(""); else document.getElementById(id).value = ""; };
        window.copyToClipboard = (id) => { document.getElementById(id).select(); document.execCommand("copy"); toast("Copied."); };
        window.pasteTo = async (id) => { try { setToolsVal(await navigator.clipboard.readText()); } catch (e) { } };

        // --- HELPERS ---
        function toast(msg, type = "ok") {
            const t = document.getElementById("toast");
            document.getElementById("toastMessage").textContent = msg;
            document.getElementById("toastIcon").className = type === "ok" ? "fas fa-check" : "fas fa-exclamation";
            t.classList.add("show");
            setTimeout(() => t.classList.remove("show"), 3000);
        }

        function confirmAction(msg) {
            return new Promise(resolve => {
                document.getElementById("confirmMessage").textContent = msg;
                const m = document.getElementById("confirmModal");
                m.classList.add("active");
                const close = (res) => { m.classList.remove("active"); resolve(res); };
                els.confirmOkBtn.onclick = () => close(true);
                els.confirmCancelBtn.onclick = () => close(false);
            });
        }

        function highlight(json) {
            return json.replace(/&/g, "&").replace(/</g, "<").replace(/>/g, ">")
                .replace(/("(\\u[a-zA-Z0-9]{4}|\\[^u]|[^\\"])*"(\s*:)?|\b(true|false|null)\b|-?\d+(?:\.\d*)?(?:[eE][+\-]?\d+)?)/g, function (match) {
                    let cls = "json-number";
                    if (/^"/.test(match)) {
                        if (/:$/.test(match)) cls = "json-key";
                        else cls = "json-string";
                    } else if (/true|false/.test(match)) cls = "json-boolean";
                    else if (/null/.test(match)) cls = "json-null";
                    return '<span class="' + cls + '">' + match + "</span>";
                });
        }
        function escape(t) { return t ? t.replace(/&/g, "&").replace(/</g, "<") : ""; }

        // --- RESIZER ---
        if (els.resizer) {
            els.resizer.onmousedown = (e) => {
                e.preventDefault();
                const isVertical = window.innerWidth <= 900;
                document.onmousemove = (e) => {
                    const box = document.querySelector(".panel").getBoundingClientRect(); // Parent container
                    if (isVertical) {
                        // Not implemented for simplicity in this version, simple flexbox handles mobile
                    } else {
                        const percent = ((e.clientX - box.left) / box.width) * 100;
                        if (percent > 10 && percent < 90) {
                            els.leftPanel.style.flex = `0 0 ${percent}%`;
                        }
                    }
                    if (toolsEditor) toolsEditor.layout();
                };
                document.onmouseup = () => { document.onmousemove = null; };
            };
        }

        render();
    </script>
</body>

</html>

corner-shape.content:
corner-shape playground

Try different shapes. Browsers without corner-shape support will show classic rounded corners via border-radius.

Panel Ustawień

Kliknij na dowolną kartę poniżej, aby ją zaznaczyć i zastosować ustawienia.

28px
Karta Testowa
Użyj panelu powyżej, aby zmienić mój wygląd.
round
Default geometry—behaves like standard border-radius.
scoop
Concave corners; feels “carved in”.
bevel
Straight chamfer instead of a curve.
notch
Inset cut at the corner—retro UI vibes.
squircle
Superellipse-based corners (smooth, modern).
square
Cancels the rounding even with border-radius set.
mixed (TL TR BR BL)
Per-corner shapes: scoop, bevel, round, notch.
superellipse(4)
Numeric control—classic squircle feel.
superellipse(8)
Higher exponent → corners trend toward square.
