                cyberpunk: { glassStyle: "glitch", primaryBg: "#0D0221", cardBg: "#190934", accentColor: "#FF00FF", textColor: "#00FFFF", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                dark: { glassStyle: "cherokee", primaryBg: "#121212", cardBg: "#1E1E1E", accentColor: "#BB86FC", textColor: "#FFFFFF", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                desert: { glassStyle: "cherokee", primaryBg: "#F4A460", cardBg: "#DEB887", accentColor: "#8B4513", textColor: "#FFFFFF", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                emerald: { glassStyle: "particles", primaryBg: "#0D2C1E", cardBg: "#1A4A33", accentColor: "#2ECC71", textColor: "#E0FFE0", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                forest: { glassStyle: "particles", primaryBg: "#1B4D3E", cardBg: "#2D6A4F", accentColor: "#74C69D", textColor: "#B7E4C7", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                galaxy: { glassStyle: "glitch", primaryBg: "#0B0B19", cardBg: "#1A1A2E", accentColor: "#7B2FBE", textColor: "#E6E6FA", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                lavender: { glassStyle: "minimal", primaryBg: "#2C1E3F", cardBg: "#3D2B4F", accentColor: "#9C6CD3", textColor: "#E6E6FA", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                midnight: { glassStyle: "glitch", primaryBg: "#121620", cardBg: "#1E2433", accentColor: "#3498DB", textColor: "#F0F4F8", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                mint: { glassStyle: "waves", primaryBg: "#E0F2F1", cardBg: "#B2DFDB", accentColor: "#26A69A", textColor: "#004D40", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                neon: { glassStyle: "glitch", primaryBg: "#2E0249", cardBg: "#570A57", accentColor: "#A91079", textColor: "#F806CC", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                nordic: { glassStyle: "minimal", primaryBg: "#FAFAFA", cardBg: "#F5F5F5", accentColor: "#607D8B", textColor: "#37474F", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                ocean: { glassStyle: "waves", primaryBg: "#1A374D", cardBg: "#406882", accentColor: "#6998AB", textColor: "#B1D0E0", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                pastel: { glassStyle: "minimal", primaryBg: "#FFF5E4", cardBg: "#FFE3E1", accentColor: "#FFD1D1", textColor: "#FF9494", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                rust: { glassStyle: "particles", primaryBg: "#2C1810", cardBg: "#4A2C20", accentColor: "#D35400", textColor: "#F5D3A8", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                sunset: { glassStyle: "cherokee", primaryBg: "#FF7B54", cardBg: "#FFB26B", accentColor: "#FFD56F", textColor: "#939B62", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                volcanic: { glassStyle: "particles", primaryBg: "#3B0000", cardBg: "#4F0000", accentColor: "#FF4500", textColor: "#FFA07A", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                rose: { glassStyle: "minimal", primaryBg: "#FFE4E1", cardBg: "#FFC0CB", accentColor: "#2E7D32", textColor: "#C71585", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                royal: { glassStyle: "glitch", primaryBg: "#191970", cardBg: "#000080", accentColor: "#4169E1", textColor: "#B0C4DE", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                spring: { glassStyle: "particles", primaryBg: "#E8F5E9", cardBg: "#C8E6C9", accentColor: "#81C784", textColor: "#2E7D32", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                summer: { glassStyle: "minimal", primaryBg: "#FFF9C4", cardBg: "#FFF59D", accentColor: "#FFD54F", textColor: "#F57F17", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                twilight: { glassStyle: "glitch", primaryBg: "#141E30", cardBg: "#243B55", accentColor: "#4B6CB7", textColor: "#E0E0E0", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                winter: { glassStyle: "waves", primaryBg: "#E3F2FD", cardBg: "#BBDEFB", accentColor: "#64B5F6", textColor: "#1976D2", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                zen: { glassStyle: "minimal", primaryBg: "#F5F5F5", cardBg: "#E0E0E0", accentColor: "#9E9E9E", textColor: "#424242", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                coral: { glassStyle: "waves", primaryBg: "#FF7F50", cardBg: "#FA8072", accentColor: "#FF6347", textColor: "#FFFFFF", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
                aurora: { glassStyle: "glitch", primaryBg: "#20203D", cardBg: "#2F2F5A", accentColor: "#7B68EE", textColor: "#98FB98", shadow: "0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" },
            };


            // --- THEME LOGIC ---
            let currentTheme = "default";

            function applyTheme(key) {
                const theme = colorPresets[key];
                if (!theme) return;

                const root = document.documentElement;
                root.style.setProperty("--primary-bg", theme.primaryBg);
                root.style.setProperty("--card-bg", theme.cardBg);
                root.style.setProperty("--accent-color", theme.accentColor);
                root.style.setProperty("--text-color", theme.textColor);
                root.style.setProperty("--box-shadow", theme.shadow);

                currentTheme = key;
                localStorage.setItem("selectedTheme", key);
                localStorage.setItem("customColors", JSON.stringify(colorPresets));

                // --- NEW: Apply Linked Glass Style ---
                if (theme.glassStyle) {
                    const styleId = theme.glassStyle;
                    document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-style', styleId);
                    localStorage.setItem('glassStyle', styleId);

                    // Update UI active state in Glass Menu
                    // We use dataset.styleId set in initGlassStyleSelector
                    const glassBtns = document.querySelectorAll('#glassGrid .theme-option-btn');
                    glassBtns.forEach(btn => {
                        if (btn.dataset.styleId === styleId) {
                            btn.classList.add('active');
                        } else {
                            btn.classList.remove('active');
                        }
                    });
                }

                // Re-render glass if init to update colors
                if(window.GlassEffect && window.GlassEffect.isInitialized) {
                    window.GlassEffect.createGradientBackground();
                    window.GlassEffect.render(); // Ensure render is called to show changes immediately
                }
            }

            const initialPresets = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(colorPresets)); // Deep copy for reset

            function resetTheme(key) {
                if (initialPresets[key]) {
                    colorPresets[key] = { ...initialPresets[key] };
                    applyTheme(key);
                    createThemeButtons();
                }
            }

            function createThemeButtons() {
                const grid = document.getElementById("themeGrid");
                grid.innerHTML = "";

                Object.keys(colorPresets).forEach((key) => {
                    const theme = colorPresets[key];

                    // Card for the theme
                    const card = document.createElement("div");
                    card.className = "theme-item";
                    Object.assign(card.style, {
                        backgroundColor: theme.primaryBg,
                        color: theme.textColor,
                        border: `1px solid ${theme.accentColor}`,
                    });

                    // Header container (Title + Edit Btn)
                    const header = document.createElement("div");
                    Object.assign(header.style, {
                        display: "flex",
                        justifyContent: "space-between",
                        alignItems: "center",
                        width: "100%"
                    });

                    // Title
                    const title = document.createElement("span");
                    title.textContent = key.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + key.slice(1);
                    title.style.fontWeight = "bold";

                    // Edit Button
                    const editBtn = document.createElement("button");
                    editBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-pen"></i>';
                    editBtn.title = "Edit Colors";
                    Object.assign(editBtn.style, {
                        border: "none",
                        borderRadius: "0px",
                        background: "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)", // Subtle background
                        color: theme.textColor,
                        fontSize: "0.8rem",
                        padding: "4px 8px",
                        cursor: "pointer",
                        transition: "all 0.2s"
                    });

                    // Hidden Container for Controls
                    const controlsContainer = document.createElement("div");
                    Object.assign(controlsContainer.style, {
                        display: "none", // Hidden by default
                        flexDirection: "column",
                        alignItems: "center",
                        width: "100%",
                        marginTop: "10px",
                        gap: "8px",
                        borderTop: `1px dashed ${theme.borderColor || 'rgba(128,128,128,0.3)'}`,
                        paddingTop: "8px"
                    });

                    // Color Pickers Container
                    const colorsRow = document.createElement("div");
                    colorsRow.className = "theme-colors-row";

                    const props = [
                        { color: theme.primaryBg, label: "BG", prop: "primaryBg" },
                        { color: theme.cardBg, label: "Card", prop: "cardBg" },
                        { color: theme.accentColor, label: "Acc", prop: "accentColor" },
                        { color: theme.textColor, label: "Txt", prop: "textColor" },
                    ];

                    props.forEach(({ color, label, prop }) => {
                        const wrapper = document.createElement("div");
                        wrapper.className = "color-picker-wrapper";

                        const input = document.createElement("input");
                        input.type = "color";
                        input.value = color;
                        Object.assign(input.style, {
                            width: "24px",
                            height: "24px",
                            padding: "0",
                            border: "none",
                            borderRadius: "0%",
                            cursor: "pointer",
                            backgroundColor: color,
                        });

                        // Update logic
                        input.addEventListener("input", (e) => {
                            colorPresets[key][prop] = e.target.value;
                            if (currentTheme === key) {
                                applyTheme(key);
                            }
                        });

                        // Prevent card click propagation
                        input.addEventListener("click", (e) => e.stopPropagation());

                        wrapper.appendChild(input);
                        colorsRow.appendChild(wrapper);
                    });

                    // Reset Button
                    const resetBtn = document.createElement("button");
                    resetBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-undo"></i> Reset';
                    Object.assign(resetBtn.style, {
                        border: "none",
                        borderRadius: "0px",
                        background: "rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.6)",
                        color: "#fff",
                        fontSize: "0.7rem",
                        padding: "4px 12px",
                        cursor: "pointer",
                        width: "100%"
                    });

                    resetBtn.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
                        e.stopPropagation();
                        resetTheme(key);
                    });

                    // Assemble Controls
                    controlsContainer.appendChild(colorsRow);
                    controlsContainer.appendChild(resetBtn);

                    // Edit Button Logic
                    editBtn.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
                        e.stopPropagation();
                        const isHidden = controlsContainer.style.display === "none";

                        if (isHidden) {
                            // Open Editor
                            controlsContainer.style.display = "flex";
                            editBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-check"></i>';
                            editBtn.style.background = "rgba(40, 167, 69, 0.6)";
                            card.classList.add("active-edit");
                        } else {
                            // Close Editor
                            controlsContainer.style.display = "none";
                            editBtn.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-pen"></i>';
                            editBtn.style.background = "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)";
                            card.classList.remove("active-edit");
                        }
                    });

                    // Assemble Header
                    header.appendChild(title);
                    header.appendChild(editBtn);

                    // Assemble Card
                    card.appendChild(header);
                    card.appendChild(controlsContainer);

                    // Apply theme on card click
                    card.addEventListener("click", () => applyTheme(key));

                    grid.appendChild(card);
                });
            }


            // --- UI FUNCTIONS ---

            // Sandbox logic
            const sandboxModal = document.getElementById('sandbox-modal');
            const sandboxFrame = document.getElementById('sandbox-frame');
            const sandboxTitle = document.getElementById('sandbox-title');
            const sandboxExternal = document.getElementById('sandbox-external');
            const loader = document.getElementById('loader');

            // Setup onload listener once
            sandboxFrame.onload = function () {
                if (sandboxFrame.src && sandboxFrame.src !== 'about:blank') {
                    sandboxFrame.style.opacity = '1';
                    loader.style.display = 'none';
                }
            };

            // EXPOSE TO WINDOW for HTML onclick
            window.openSandbox = function(url, title) {
                loader.style.display = 'flex';
                sandboxFrame.style.opacity = '0';
                sandboxFrame.src = 'about:blank';

                sandboxTitle.textContent = title;
                sandboxExternal.href = url;

                sandboxModal.classList.add('active');

                setTimeout(() => {
                    sandboxFrame.src = url;
                }, 50);
            }

            window.closeSandbox = function() {
                sandboxModal.classList.remove('active');
                setTimeout(() => {
                    sandboxFrame.src = 'about:blank';
                }, 300);
            }

            document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
                if (e.key === 'Escape' && sandboxModal.classList.contains('active')) {
                    window.closeSandbox();
                }
            });

            // Render Function
            const gridContainer = document.getElementById('grid-container');
            const noResults = document.getElementById('no-results');

            function renderTools(filterText = '') {
                gridContainer.innerHTML = '';
                let hasResults = false;
                const lowerFilter = filterText.toLowerCase();

                categories.forEach(cat => {
                    const filteredTools = cat.tools.filter(tool =>
                                                           tool.name.toLowerCase().includes(lowerFilter) ||
                                                           tool.desc.toLowerCase().includes(lowerFilter) ||
                                                           cat.title.toLowerCase().includes(lowerFilter)
                                                          );

                    if (filteredTools.length > 0) {
                        hasResults = true;

                        const section = document.createElement('div');
                        section.className = 'category-section';

                        const header = document.createElement('div');
                        header.className = 'category-header-wrap';
                        header.innerHTML = `
                                <i class="fas ${cat.icon}" style="font-size: 1.5rem; color: var(--highlight-color);"></i>
                                <h2 class="category-title" style="color: var(--text-color);">${cat.title}</h2>
                            `;
                        section.appendChild(header);

                        const grid = document.createElement('div');
                        grid.className = 'grid-layout';

                        filteredTools.forEach(tool => {
                            const card = document.createElement('div');
                            card.className = 'tool-card';

                            card.onclick = (e) => {
                                // Don't open if clicking color picker inside (just in case)
                                if (e.target.tagName === 'INPUT') return;

                                if (!e.ctrlKey && !e.metaKey) {
                                    e.preventDefault();
                                    window.openSandbox(tool.url, tool.name);
                                } else {
                                    window.open(tool.url, '_blank');
                                }
                            };

                            const iconType = tool.type || 'fas';

                            card.innerHTML = `
                                    <div class="card-top">
                                        <div class="card-icon-box">
                                            <i class="${iconType} ${tool.icon} fa-lg"></i>
            </div>
                                        <i class="fas fa-expand card-link-icon"></i>
            </div>
                                    <h3 class="card-title">${tool.name}</h3>
                                    <p class="card-desc">${tool.desc}</p>
                                `;
                            grid.appendChild(card);
                        });

                        section.appendChild(grid);
                        gridContainer.appendChild(section);
                    }
                });

                if (!hasResults) {
                    noResults.classList.remove('hidden');
                } else {
                    noResults.classList.add('hidden');
                }
            }

            const searchInput = document.getElementById('searchInput');
            searchInput.addEventListener('input', (e) => {
                renderTools(e.target.value);
            });

            function updateClock() {
                const now = new Date();
                const clock = document.getElementById('clock');
                if(clock) {
                    clock.textContent = now.toLocaleTimeString('en-US', {
                        hour12: false,
                        hour: '2-digit',
                        minute: '2-digit',
                        second: '2-digit'
                    });
                }
            }
            setInterval(updateClock, 1000);
            updateClock();

            // Glass Style Selector
            const glassStyles = [
                { id: 'glitch', name: 'Glitch', icon: 'fa-bolt' },
                { id: 'cherokee', name: 'Cherokee', icon: 'fa-feather' },
                { id: 'waves', name: 'Waves', icon: 'fa-water' },
                { id: 'particles', name: 'Particles', icon: 'fa-circle' },
                { id: 'minimal', name: 'Minimal', icon: 'fa-grip-lines' }
            ];

            function initGlassStyleSelector() {
                const currentStyle = document.documentElement.getAttribute('data-style') || 'glitch';

                // Create glass style selector in navbar
                const navActions = document.querySelector('.nav-actions');
                if (!navActions) return;

                const glassWrapper = document.createElement('div');
                glassWrapper.className = 'theme-wrapper';
                glassWrapper.innerHTML = `
                <button class="theme-btn" id="glassToggleBtn" title="Change Glass Style">
                    <i class="fas fa-layer-group"></i>
            </button>
                <div class="theme-menu" id="glassMenu">
                    <div style="padding-bottom: 10px; border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color); margin-bottom: 10px; font-weight: bold; font-size: 0.9rem; color: var(--text-color);">
                        Glass Style
            </div>
                    <div id="glassGrid" style="display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 8px;">
                        <!-- JS will inject buttons here -->
            </div>
            </div>
            `;

                // Insert before theme wrapper
                const themeWrapper = navActions.querySelector('.theme-wrapper');
                if (themeWrapper) {
                    navActions.insertBefore(glassWrapper, themeWrapper);
                } else {
                    navActions.appendChild(glassWrapper);
                }

                const glassToggleBtn = document.getElementById('glassToggleBtn');
                const glassMenu = document.getElementById('glassMenu');
                const glassGrid = document.getElementById('glassGrid');

                // Populate glass style buttons
                glassStyles.forEach(style => {
                    const btn = document.createElement('button');
                    btn.className = 'theme-option-btn';
                    // Add ID for easier selection by theme
                    btn.dataset.styleId = style.id;

                    if (style.id === currentStyle) {
                        btn.classList.add('active');
                    }
                    btn.innerHTML = `
                    <i class="fas ${style.icon}"></i>
                    <span>${style.name}</span>
                `;
                    btn.onclick = () => {
                        document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-style', style.id);
                        localStorage.setItem('glassStyle', style.id);

                        // Update active state
                        glassGrid.querySelectorAll('.theme-option-btn').forEach(b => b.classList.remove('active'));
                        btn.classList.add('active');

                        // Reinitialize glass effect
                        if (window.GlassEffect && window.GlassEffect.isInitialized) {
                            window.GlassEffect.createGradientBackground();
                            window.GlassEffect.render();
                        }

                        glassMenu.classList.remove('show');
                    };
                    glassGrid.appendChild(btn);
                });

                // Toggle menu
                glassToggleBtn.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                    e.stopPropagation();
                    glassMenu.classList.toggle('show');
                    // Close theme menu if open
                    const themeMenu = document.getElementById('themeMenu');
                    if (themeMenu) themeMenu.classList.remove('show');
                });

                // Close menu when clicking outside
                document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                    if (!glassWrapper.contains(e.target)) {
                        glassMenu.classList.remove('show');
                    }
                });
            }

            // --- MAIN INITIALIZATION ---

            // Theme Switcher UI Toggle
            const themeBtn = document.getElementById('themeToggleBtn');
            const themeMenu = document.getElementById('themeMenu');

            themeBtn.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                e.stopPropagation();
                themeMenu.classList.toggle('show');
                themeBtn.classList.toggle('active');

                // Close glass menu if open
                const glassMenu = document.getElementById('glassMenu');
                if(glassMenu) glassMenu.classList.remove('show');
            });

            document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                if (!themeMenu.contains(e.target) && !themeBtn.contains(e.target)) {
                    themeMenu.classList.remove('show');
                    themeBtn.classList.remove('active');
                }
            });

            document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
                // 0. Update year
                const yearSpan = document.getElementById('year');
                if(yearSpan) yearSpan.textContent = new Date().getFullYear();

                // 1. Load glass style
                const savedGlassStyle = localStorage.getItem('glassStyle');
                if (savedGlassStyle) {
                    document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-style', savedGlassStyle);
                }

                // 2. Load custom colors if exist
                const storedColors = localStorage.getItem("customColors");
                if (storedColors) {
                    Object.assign(colorPresets, JSON.parse(storedColors));
                }

                // 3. Build UI
                createThemeButtons();
                initGlassStyleSelector();

                // 4. Apply saved theme
                const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem("selectedTheme") || "default";
                applyTheme(savedTheme);

                // 5. Render Tools
                renderTools();

                // 6. Init 3D BG (Last to ensure vars are set)
                if (window.GlassEffect) {
                    window.GlassEffect.init();
                }
            });

        </script>

    </body>

</html>

Context Menu.content:
Pulpit Demonstracyjny

Witaj w rozbudowanym interfejsie. Kliknij prawym przyciskiem, aby odkryć opcje.

Personalizacja

Dostosuj kolor wiodący, motyw i styl interfejsu za pomocą dostępnych paneli.

Zapis Ustawień

Twoje preferencje wyglądu są automatycznie zapisywane w pamięci przeglądarki.

O Projekcie

Dowiedz się więcej o technologiach i funkcjach użytych do stworzenia tej demonstracji.
